hooks.command: echo 'Running pre-commit checks...' && npm run lint && npm run test:quick && npm run build
echo 'Validating push...' && git-secrets --scan && echo 'Security scan passed'
echo 'WARNING: Editing sensitive files requires extra caution' && echo 'Ensure no secrets are committed to git' && read -p 'Continue with caution? (y/n): ' confirm && [[ $confirm == y ]]
echo 'DANGER: Destructive rm command detected!' && echo 'Command: rm $*' && read -p 'Are you absolutely sure? Type DELETE to confirm: ' confirm && [[ $confirm == DELETE ]]
echo 'package.json modification detected - will run npm install after edit'
echo 'Installing updated dependencies...' && npm install && echo 'Dependencies updated successfully'
echo 'Code file modified - running quick type check' && (npm run type-check || echo 'Type check failed - please review')
